label: task
search: Search for a task by title, description or tags
description_proposal: Reviewed implementations by the marketplace curators ready to be approved by the marketplace curators.
description_deliverable: Raw implementations from the marketplace developers ready to be reviewed by anyone and approved into proposals by the marketplace curators

descriptions.select-network: Select the network and marketplace you want to create your task
descriptions.details: Enter the necessary information to understand your task
descriptions.github: Inform the repository and the branch where the solution will be made
descriptions.reward: When creating a new task, you have two options regarding the reward:
descriptions.reward-1: Self-fund: You use your own money to create the task. This means you will be responsible for providing the reward money that will be given to the person who successfully completes the task.
descriptions.reward-2: Seek funding: You can seek funding for the task. This means you can look for other individuals who are willing to contribute to the reward money.
descriptions.review: In this step you will view the main information and get a sense of how your task is doing

recognize-finished.title: Recognize as finished
recognize-finished.error: Failed to mark task as finished

start-working.title: Start Working
start-working.success: To start working on this task
start-working.error: To start working on this task

errors.sync: The task was created, but something went wrong while reading the blockchain, please go to the home page while we try to get your task
errors.description-limit: Exceeds allowed limit of characters and files: {{value}}
errors.no-networks-chain: The selected network has no active marketplaces
errors.banned-domain: This domain is banned and cannot be used to open tasks.
errors.invalid-link: Invalid link provided. Please check if the link has the protocol (http/https) or the link is correct.

title: Create new Task

deliverable-types.label: Deliverable Types
deliverable-types.description: Specify the type of work for this task.

origin-link.label: Origin Link
origin-link.description: If you have a project boilerplate, a figma design, or something that might help people to work on this task, you can provide a link below.

placeholders.design: Figma template, or link to design

reward-funders-description: Reward anyone who funds this task.
not-found-funding: Funding requests make the community itself fund ideas they would like for their applications
sub-title-bounties: A collection of the most recent tasks and MVP Marketplaces on our ecosystem
edit-text: You are currently editing a task

kyc.tool-tip: Become mandatory do a KYC validation to participate on task.
kyc.bounty-tool-tip: This task requires KYC , you can activate it in your profile
kyc.identified: Successfully identified, you can close this modal

creating-this-bounty: By creating this task you agree to our

service-fee.description: You Can find more information in our
service-fee.support-message: Amount paid to incentivize the community to participate on the marketplace

set-reward-description: Amount distributed to the person who solution was accepted
set-funded-reward-description: Amount you want to rise to be distributed to the person who solution was accepted
set-funders-reward-description: Amount you want to pay for the funders as recompense for their participation

total-amount.title: Total Amount
total-amount.description: Amount you will pay for this task (reward + services fees)

origin-link-warning.title: Origin
origin-link-warning.you-are-going-to: You are going to navigate to
origin-link-warning.provided-by: This link was provided by the task creator. Please be careful and access only if you know the domain.

allow-list.title: Not allowed
allow-list.content: Creation of tasks is restricted on this marketplace to a curated list of addresses. Please, select another marketplace or contact the marketplace governor.

allow-list.not-allowed: Task creation is not allowed with this address

approximated-values-warning: Defining the Reward amount will result in approximate values in the contract. If you want exact values, set the Total Amount first.
